alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 1:10PM MST until December 31 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches, except 2 to 10 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Blowing and drifting snow are also likely. * WHERE...The Centennial Mountains and the Island Park area, the Big Hole Mountains, and the Bear River Mountains including Emigrant Summit. This includes the towns of Victor, Kilgore, and Island Park. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Drifting snow will hamper efforts to keep roads and highways clear. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
